thread.section_title: Spotahome opiniones | Opiniones de clientes sobre Spotahome | www.spotahome.com
thread.title: Yossra Kerkeb

author: Yossra Kerkeb
title: Yossra Kerkeb
text:
I used Spotahome recently to book an apartment for 2 people for a period of 5 months, unfortunately, upon arrival me and the landlady had a disagreement and we decided it would be better for me not to move in the apartment. After contacting Spotahome and explaining the situation to them as well as the reason for which I did not move in ( the actual capacity for the flat was 1 person not 2 as was mentioned in the site), I obtained a full refund and a discount from Spotahome in less than 48hours.
If you have any fear about using Spotahome, don't worry, the company is serious and will help you feel satisfied to the best of their capacity.
